titleStmt.title: [An appendix to the office and duty of an executor.]
titleStmt.author: Manley, Thomas, 1628-1690.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption on A2r. Imprint conjectured by Wing.
Running title reads: An appendix to the office of an executor.
Leaves disbound and inlaid on 4⁰ leaves. Original size apparently an 8⁰.
Imperfect; filmed copy lacks title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
